content:encoded:
Topics: Divorce, Adult Children, Estrangement, Teens, Sexual Integrity, Social Media 
Hosts: Zach Matchett, Dr. Sheri Keffer, Dr. Jacqui Mack-Harris

Caller Questions:

  1. How do I deal with parental alienation with my 19yo daughter? She was 17yo when I divorced, and now she is married. 
  2. Our 15yo son is receiving sexually suggestive texts from his friend; how should my husband talk to him about it? 

Suggested Resources:
How We Love Our Kids
Every Young Man’s Battle
